text: Khloé Kardashian ’ s denim company, Good American, is all about inclusivity. So the star jumped at the chance to create a new size — 15 — after the brand saw its highest return rate in sizes 14 and 16. And the 34 - year - old insists every piece in the line is offered in the full range. “ I don ’ t think it ’ s a brand ’ s job to tell a woman what her [ style ] options are, ” she says.
